gig init
gig add one.txt
gig commit -m 'add file one'
gig add two.txt
gig commit -m 'add file two'
gig log -n 0
! stdout .
gig log -n 1
! stdout 'add file one'
stdout 'add file two'
gig log -n 10
stdout 'add file one'
stdout 'add file two'

-- one.txt --
this is file one
-- two.txt --
this is file two
